extendedInfo.description: âDiwali Firecrackers Funâ Stands No. 1 Free Adventure, Action and top 3 App on India IOS App Store (As on Dt. 22 October 2011) To celebrate this are offering 2 Special Editions Totally Free. Diwali Firecrackers Fun for KID (simplified version for Kids with 15 Levels) Diwali Firecrackers Fun WIZ (For Game wizards who have really mastered âDiwali Firecrackers Funâ with 12 Levels) On Android NowEnjoy and A Very Happy Diwali. Game Play A very simple and engaging game to collect Firecrackers. As you go along you win more and more Firecrackers of different variety. Win and share your score on your Facebook.About Diwali Diwali commemorates the return of Lord Rama from his 14-year-long exile and vanquishing the demon-king Ravana. In joyous celebration of the return of their king, the people of Ayodhya, the Capital of Rama, illuminated the kingdom with earthen diyas and by bursting firecrackers.
